name: Isse Takes the Bus
description:
Isse Takes the Bus is a small interactive fiction I made based on my personal journey into adulthood. Although I am still writing it, this particular chapter says the most about me and the main character, and how difficult it was for us to start taking charge of our life. There's a lot of symbolism in the room, and I hope you take the time to try figure out what each object might mean.

I hope to someday further expand the game into a full point-and-click adventure.
